name: The Silver Flame
text:
ACTION: Roll 1 die and purge this card; if the result is a 10, gain 1 victory point. Otherwise, remove all of your units from the galaxy and you are eliminated.
The Silver Flame may be exchanged as part of a transaction.
flavourText: *Ank-Syl Siven flared, bright red briefly overtaking blue. "Would I lie to you?" The flame pulsed, suspended in the air before him. Was it real? Or just an illusion?*
